Jackson.WJSU-FM:
WJSU-FM (88.5 FM), is a NPR member station in Jackson, Mississippi, USA, owned by Jackson State University (JSU). Its studios are located separately from the main campus at the Mississippi e-Center at JSU, and its transmitter is atop JSU's administration building.
The station carries primarily jazz-related programs, with some NPR programming and local programs, plus R&B music on Saturday mornings and gospel music all day on Sundays.
